title: Bianca Andreescu seems born to rule as next generation of players at WTA Finals signal a new era
text:
Just as a good year in the office usually means a banger of a Christmas party, so you can judge the quality of a tennis season by who makes it to the end-of-year jamboree.

On this basis, 2019 represents a watershed. Neither Serena Williams nor Maria Sharapova features among the eight names on the drawsheet for the WTA Finals, which begin on Sunday in Shenzhen, China’s fourth-largest city.​

Instead, this is one of the youngest and most charismatic groups there has been at the event.​

Let’s start with Belinda Bencic, 22, the latest “Swiss Miss” to follow in the footsteps of Martina Hingis. Then we have world No 1 Ashleigh Barty (23), an all-court player in the great Australian tradition. And the...
description: Just as a good year in the office usually means a banger of a Christmas party, so you can judge the quality of a tennis season by who makes it to the end-of-year jamboree.
